title: Tredway: Housing Affordability Crisis Here to Stay
description: Chad Tredway, JP Morgan Asset Management Global Head of Real Estate, says the affordability crisis is here to stay, adding that the average first-time homebuyer is now 40 years old. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that the firm is seeing people move toward the South and West, including Texas, the Carolinas, and Florida. (Source: Bloomberg)
